Author: vydka
Text: Trying to remember that. I started journaling everyday so I can track all of my small victories. Hopefully it makes me feel better about this whole process. Hope your mom feels better soon! ❤️

Author: stregapegg
Text: Dude, you just take the time you need. It’s not a race and everyone recovers differently. I know it’s not the same, but my mom just had back surgery and most people her age are well into recovery by this point in time whereas she’s still bedridden. It’s not her fault, it’s just how her body works.  You’re doing as well as you can, just remember that! You can do it! Who care how long it takes.
